VEC.Q: How many chords are in this chord chart?

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the clockwise direction from arc Hannah?
SRP.A: The next arc clockwise from arc Hannah is arc {Lake Sherry}.

SRP.Q: In the chord chart, what is the next arc in the counterclockwise direction from arc Kristenmouth?
SRP.A: The next arc counterclockwise from arc Kristenmouth is arc {Lake Sherry}.

Which arc has the largest input flow in this chord chart?

VE.Q: What is the flow value from Kristenmouth to Lake Sherry in the chord chart?
What is the flow value from Hannah to Lake Sherry in the chord chart?

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum flow value between Kristenmouth and Lake Sherry in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The maximum flow value between Kristenmouth and Lake Sherry is {672}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum flow value between Lake Sherry and Kristenmouth in the chord chart?
EVJ.A: The minimum flow value between Lake Sherry and Kristenmouth is {328}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow output from Kristenmouth?
SC.A: The total flow output from Kristenmouth is {1136}.

SC.Q: What is the total flow input by Lake Sherry?
SC.A: The total flow input by Lake Sherry is {446}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow greater than 740? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {808} from {Kristenmouth} to {Hannah}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow less than 326? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {118} from {Hannah} to {Lake Sherry}, a flow of {324} from {Lake Sherry} to {Hannah}.

NF.Q: Which pairs of nodes in the chord chart have a flow between 221 and 651? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.
NF.A: There is a flow of {324} from {Lake Sherry} to {Hannah}, a flow of {630} from {Hannah} to {Kristenmouth}, a flow of {328} from {Kristenmouth} to {Lake Sherry}.

NC.Q: Which flow is larger: from Lake Sherry to Hannah or from Hannah to Kristenmouth?
NC.A: The flow from {Hannah} to {Kristenmouth} is larger.

NC.Q: Which flow is the largest: from Lake Sherry to Hannah, from Lake Sherry to Kristenmouth, or from Hannah to Kristenmouth?
NC.A: The flow from {Lake Sherry} to {Kristenmouth} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which category has the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow?
MSR.A: The category with the highest proportion of outgoing flow relative to its total flow is {Lake Sherry}.

MSR.Q: Which pair has the strongest chord connection in this chord chart?
MSR.A: The strongest chord connection is between {Hannah} and {Kristenmouth}.

VA.Q: To minimize the crossings between chords, please reorder the outer arcs and list the reorder arc order in clockwise direction.
VA.A: The reordered arc order in clockwise direction is: {Arc Hannah, Arc Kristenmouth, Arc Lake Sherry}.
